title: how ascension works
body: So ive been playing that mode a since it first got released, im a tad confused now, when it first came out you killed the boss to get the power, then it was stand in the zone and when no enemies are there you get the power, now it doesnt make sense, now when i kill the boss, if an enemy walks in when we are in there they take it, and when i walk in after they get the boss they get it, but there is no pickup thing, is it luck based or what? ive been in it alone for ages before and nothing, any explanation?

replies.body: the visual box that they show u doesnt really help with those close knockbacks, but yeah, last one in the circle gets it (STUPID)
